title: Lyle Fox
maintext:
ATKINSON — Services for Lyle Fox, 82, of Atkinson, were held Monday, July 23, at the First Presbyterian Church in Atkinson. Burial was in the Inman cemetery with military rites provided by the O’Neill American Legion.
Seger Funeral Home in Atkinson was in charge of arrangements.
He died Friday, July 20, 2018, at the West Holt Memorial Hospital in Atkinson.
